headline: I know, I know you have heard this before, but let's go over it again...
bio: Hi there, I'm David Esparza, a passionate Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on building reliable and efficient backends, but don't be fooled -I also enjoy crafting seamless front-end experiences. With a knack for problem-solving and a love for clean code practices, I enjoy turning complex challenges into elegant solutions. When I'm not coding, you can find me training or improving my technical skills to stay ahead in this ever-evolving tech world. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
